transcript: martin: Hi there! How can I assist you today?
You: can you see my onedrive desktop

martin: I can help you check your OneDrive Desktop. Let me list the files and folders there for you.

command: dir "C:\Users\gilli\OneDrive\Desktop"
You: please navigate to the pogo teambuilder folder

martin: Let me handle that for you. I will navigate to the pogo teambuilder folder.

Please provide the full path to the pogo teambuilder folder if it's not located in the current directory. If you have a specific path in mind, let me know!
You: it is located in the same directory

martin: Let me list the files in your current directory to assist you. 

command: dir C:\Users\gilli
